a difference between similar things, or a change from the usual amount or form of something
White bread is really just a variation of French bread.
variations in the quality of the rugs
There is a great deal of variation among the responses.
The study concluded that the variation between the CD players was very small.
something that is done in a way that is different from the way it is usually done
Most of his poems are variations on the theme of love.
one of a set of short pieces of music, each based on the same simple tune
a difference or change in the normal amount or appearance of something
Labor figures in both reports are adjusted for seasonal variation (=variation that depends on the time of year).
They are using the same advertising campaign, with just a variation on the original slogan.
